title: As a Baseball Econ Admin, I want to see if a player's agent is certified when looking at the player's profile
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the Agent/Agency section of a pro player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN user will see a new "Primary Agent Certified" field
AND this field will not be editable
AND If the agent listed as the player's primary agent has the Certification field on their profile set to 'Yes,' the new "Primary Agent Certified" field will display 'Yes'
AND If the agent listed as the player's primary agent has the Certification field on their profile set to 'No,' the new "Primary Agent Certified" field will display 'No'

title: As a Baseball Econ Admin, I want to Delete an Agency
custom_steps:
AC:
 - Any BOC User with Agent Agency Editor permissions, will see a Delete button when viewing an Agency's profile in Edit mode
 - Clicking the button will launch a modal prompting the user to confirm their action
 - If they confirm, the Agency's profile is deleted and the user is returned to the Agent & Agency Utility
 - If they do not confirm, the modal is dismissed and the user is returned to the profile

title: As a Baseball Econ Admin, I want to Delete an Agent
custom_steps:
AC:

* Any BOC User with Agent Agency Editor permissions, will see a Delete button when viewing an Agent's profile in Edit mode
* Clicking the button will launch a modal prompting the user to confirm their action
** If they confirm, the Agent's profile is deleted and the user is returned to the Agent & Agency Utility
** If they do not confirm, the modal is dismissed and the user is returned to the profile

title: As a Baseball Econ Admin, I don't want a player's agent to auto-default
custom_steps:
Business Value:  Currently, if a player's agent leaves an agency, ebis auto-selects the first alphabetical agent from the same agency.  This leads to the wrong agent being listed on a player's profile.

AC:
 - When an agent changes agencies, and the player does not have any "Representing" agents, ebis will not select a new agent for the player
 - The player will stay with the same agency, but the Agent will be blank
 - If the player has "Representing" agents, and their "Primary" agent leaves, ebis should select the first alphabetical (by last name) agent as their primary agent

title: As a MJC Admin, I would like to see "Confirmed Org" on MJCs
custom_steps:
AC:
 - In the Club Info section of MJC's, there will be a new "Confirmed Org" field
 - This field will capture the Org the player is with at the time the MJC reaches Confirmed Terms state
 - This will not be an editable field
 - This field will also appear in the General Information section of the MJC Summary screen

title: INC0094476 - MJC Advanced Search to Include Position Filters
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be two new position filters added to the MJ Contract advanced search:
** Position
** Stats Position
* Position will reflect the player profile position at the time of signing
* Stats Position will reflect the calculated stats position at the time of signing
* List of positions will reflect the full list of positions in the DB

title: As a MJC Admin, I want to delete a saved Payroll Impact Projection
custom_steps:
Wires:

* [https://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=projected_payroll_impact|https://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=projected_payroll_impact]
* [https://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=delete_projected_payroll_impact|https://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=delete_projected_payroll_impact]

AC:

* There will be a trash can icon on the Projected Payroll Impact widget, as depicted
* Clicking the icon will launch the modal in the provided wire
* The modal will have a delete and a cancel icon
* Clicking Cancel will dismiss the modal
* Clicking the Delete button will removed the Projection from the system, dismiss the modal, and display a delete successful notification
* Make a logical delete

title: As a MJC Admin, I want to Save or Cancel
custom_steps:
Wire: https://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=new_projected_payroll_impact&fn=0

AC:
 - There will be a Save button and a Cancel button on the projected contract terms, as depicted on the wire
 - Clicking save will commit the changes
  -- a blue save successful notification will be returned
 - Clicking the cancel button will prompt the user to confirm their action
  -- if they do not confirm, the modal will be dismissed
  -- if they do confirm, any changes will be lost and the user will be returned to the Projected Payroll Impact widget

title: As a MJC Admin, I want to calculate the projected payroll impact
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1970143264/Data+Discovery+Project+Payroll+Impact+-+Terms

Wire:  https://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=new_projected_payroll_impact&fn=0

AC:
 - When all required fields are filled out, the Calculate button will become active
 - Clicking Calculate will run all the payroll calcs and the following columns will be populated:
  -- LRD Salary
  -- CBT Salary
  -- Total LRD Salary
 - After calcs are run, the Calculate button will become inactive
 - If any changes are made to the required fields, the Calculate button will become active again

title: As a MJC Admin, I want to add a Pay Schedule to a projected MJC
custom_steps:
Wires:

* [https://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=new_projected_payroll_impact|https://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=new_projected_payroll_impact]
* [https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=payment_scheduler|https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=payment_scheduler]

AC:

* There will be a 'Pay Sch' button next to Signing Bonus field
* There will be a 'Pay Sch' button next to Base Salary for each year of the projected contract
* Clicking the 'Pay Sch' will launch the same modal that is on MJ Contracts
* The button will be white if there is no Pay Schedule entered
*   â€“ It will turn blue if there is a schedule entered

title: As a MJC Admin, I want to enter terms on a projected contract terms sheet
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1970143264/Data+Discovery+Project+Payroll+Impact+-+Terms

Wire: https://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=new_projected_payroll_impact

AC:
 - When the user enters values into the Start Year and Non-Opt Yrs fields, the system will generate the Terms portion of the page
 - The first year displayed will be the value entered into Start Year
 - The number of rows will be determined by the values entered
 - If these values are changed, or values are entered into Opt Yrs and Signing Bonus, the Term portion of the page will update automatically to reflect these changes
 - The terms section will match the provided wire and data discovery

Note: No calculations will be handled as part of this story

title: As a MJC Admin, I want to create a new Projected MJC to determine payroll impact
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1970143264/Data+Discovery+Project+Payroll+Impact+-+Terms

Wire: https://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=new_projected_payroll_impact

AC:
 - On the Projected Payroll Impact widget, there will be a Create New button, as displayed
 - Clicking the Create New button will launch a new, blank projected contract terms sheet
 - The terms sheet will match the provided wire frame and data discovery

Note: This story only covers the Contract Info, Dates, and Comments sections of the page

title: As a MJC Admin, I want to see a Projected Payroll Impact widget
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1968898131/Data+Discovery+-+Projected+Payroll+Impact+Widget

Wire: https://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=projected_payroll_impact

AC:
 - There will be a new "Proj. Payroll Impact" tab added to the Major Contracts Dashbaord
 - The tab will appear after Payroll Reports in the left nav
 - Clicking it will load the tab and display the "Projected Payroll Impact" tab
 - The widget will match the provided data discovery and wire
 - BOC users will be able to view saved contracts from all 30 Orgs using the Header filter
 - Club User will only be able to view their own saved contracts

title: As an EBIS User, I don't want to 2 factor authenticate every time I log in
custom_steps:
AC:
 - Users will only need to 2-factor authenticate once every 12 or 24 hours.

title: As an ebis user, I want the auto-log out extended to 4 hours
custom_steps:
AC:
 - the auto log out time will be extended to 4 hours
 - the system will not log users out for being inactive less than 4 hours

title: Designate for Assignment - Placement Date required field error
custom_steps:
two issues here

issue one: deleting the Placement Date value causes the "Roster Affected" radio buttons. after deleting the placement date value, the radio buttons switch to 25 - man and 40 man roster. Should always display as 26 man, 28 - man, and 40-man

issue two: clicking Save returns a 500 error instead of "Placement Date is a required field" error message

Steps to Repro:
1. log on as club user
2. create DFA transaction for player 
3. delete Placement Date 
4. click save

issue 1: view Roster Affected radio buttons
expected: 26 - man, 28 - man, 40 - man
actual: 25 - man and 40 - man !Screen Shot 2021-09-30 at 11.15.44 AM.png|thumbnail!  !Screen Shot 2021-09-30 at 11.16.19 AM.png|thumbnail! 

issue 2: post save
expected: "Placement Date is a required field" error message
actual: 500 error

title: INC0177438 - As a Baseball Ops Admin, I want ebis to remind users of MJ Terms in a player's MNC when they are selected to the MJ Roster
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When submitting a "Selection to MJ Roster" transaction, the system will perform a check to see if the player has any MJ Terms in their minor league UPC
 - If MJ Terms are found, the system will return the following soft warning:
  -- Header: Warning
  -- Body: "As a reminder, this player has Major League contract terms in his Minor League contract.â€�
  -- Buttons: OK, Back
 - If no MJ Terms are found, this warning will not be displayed

title: As a User, I want to removed Active Limits from the UI for the Complex Leagues
custom_steps:
AC:

* The roster limit flyover will no longer display an Active Limit for the complex leagues
* Numbers should never be red, as there is no limit.

title: As a User, I want to remove the active limit checks for the Complex Leagues
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will no longer be Active Limit Checks for the complex league
* Includes identifying the transactions that run checks against Active limit (please list in comments)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see if a not under contract Employee is Ineligible or Suspended
custom_preconds:
Data Discovery: 
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789598/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Profile+Header|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789598/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Profile+Header

GIVEN BOC user is viewing an employee that IS "NOT UNDER CONTRACT"
custom_steps: WHEN BOC User clicks the create new menu
custom_expected:
THEN boc user will have the ability to place these employees on the SUSPENDED or RESTRICTED LIST
AND Inactive List will be the only category of transactions available for EMPs (MAJ and MIN)
AND the full list of Inactive List transactions will be available to select
AND employees with an Inactive List status will have their profile header updated with the correct status
AND BOC User will be able to reinstate employee as well

  ” Searching for BÃez will return BÃ¡ez and Baez
 - Advanced Search will be updated to return players with special characters in their name, even if the user doesnt type the special characters
  ” I.e. typing Baez with return players names Baez and players named BÃez
  ” Searching for BÃez will return BÃ¡ez and Baez

title: As a User, I want ebis to display a message when reconnecting to the R5 Draft after a timeout
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a user gets disconnected from the Rule 5 Draft screen due to the GCP Connection Timeout, ebis will display a message until the connection is restored
 - The message will be a red banner notification, similar to the Rule 4 screen
 - The message will read "Confirming Draft Connection"

title: As a Club User, I want a hyperlink to the User Permission Form on the User Accounts Page in ebis
custom_steps: WHEN a Club System Admin user navigates to the User Accounts page, there will a hyperlink available to opens the surveygizmo permission form.

title: As a Risk Management User, I want the All MNC F/G custom report updated to reflect the view
custom_steps:
The report "All Minor League Contracts by Club with Addendum F and G Included" (Query 33) had it's view updated to reflect new requirements from the business.  However, those updates were never made to the report.

The attached file is an export we provided the users and can be used as a template for what the report should look like.

 [^mnc_addF_addg.xlsx]
